about_the_game:
Plot.

You work in a small laboratory for water research, enjoying a quiet and peaceful life you have with your wife and son.


Everything changes when Refleaktion Corporation becomes its new owner.


Having to make decisions that go against your morality, you keep telling yourself your lifelong project will result in a discovery that does more good than harm.

But there is a limit to everything.

Soon you find out that the next step in your research is conducting experiments on people. You quit your job in order to escape to the countryside with your family and clear yourself of suspicion.

Except when you return home your wife and son are missing, and there is a corpse of an unknown man hanging from a ceiling in your study.

Get ready for it is just the beginning.


Immerse yourself in the world of Leak, where science meets rituals. Feel the fine line between hope and despair. Live out the story of a man who does the unthinkable in hopes to return to his normal life.

Resist the spirits that have entered our world in the form of pure agony and nightmares.

Legends.

Collect lost pages from the book – it will help you learn more about all that is happening.

Locations.

Explore the house and the surrounding area – much of the action will take place outside the house.


Do not hesitate to wander around – you can find a lot of interesting and mysterious things. Do not go too far into the forest however or you are risking freezing to death!

As you progress through the game, you will transition to other locations and explore memories of the main character.

Gameplay.


Examine the items you find – you will be able to interact with some of them.


Choose the appropriate difficulty for a comfortable gameplay:
- Easy Mode provides the player with more hints, ghost haunting happens less.
- In Hard Mode there are no hints, so the player will have to solve mysteries on their own. Just be careful while exploring and never stop moving – they are always near.


Breaking the fourth wall! We included interactions between the main character and your real life. Be careful. Do not answer your phone or check your email.

Sound Design.

Music and sound design will make you feel to the max the horror, desperation, and grief of the main character – even by just listening to the game OST separately.


Be the first to get the latest news! Links to our social media can be found on our website. There we share news about the game development process and exciting new materials.

We look forward to you joining our community!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2400 / AMD CPU with 4 physical cores @ 3Ghz or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 380 or better (3 gb video memory or more)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For low-performing PCs, we recommend selecting DX11 in the Graphic Settings and then restarting the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-2600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 / Radeon™ RX Vega⁶⁴ or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: For video cards performing lower than NVIDIA RTX 2080 and it's alternatives, we recommend turning off Virtual Shadow in the Graphic Settings.

short_description: Leak is a psychological horror game. Except when you return home your family are missing, and there is a corpse of an unknown man hanging from a ceiling in your study. Explore the house and the area, solve riddles and hide from monsters, for saving your family. Be careful - you are being watched.

English*, Russian*, Ukrainian
